sentences.sContent: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.sCn: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.sContent: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.sCn: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

synos.tran: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构

phrases.pCn: n. （美）遮阳伞（海滨或花园用的）

trans.tranCn: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
trans.tranOther: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.
